website_summaries.verdict: Between the ability to pick up actual dust bunnies, its realistic sound, and how this toy looks just like the real one that grown-ups use, kids are sure to enjoy this model.
pros: Spot-on replica of the iconic Dyson vacuum
Dust container is easy to empty
cons: Required trio of AAA batteries aren’t included

customer_reviews.title: Easily breaks, cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: We were so excited to see this toy vacuum for our kids since they love to help clean up, but the first time we got the vacuum it broke within a few days. The second time we received a replacement and it literally broke within less than 24 hours. It’s a cute vacuum and the kids loved it, but it is cheaply made and not durable at all. My kids aren’t rough with toys, but this vacuum is not worth buying. I’m very disappointed in this product, especially since we have to spend time to send it back again and look for something else. Amazons Customer Service was amazing in helping us with the issues though.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Terribly disappointed. My 2 yr old LOVES to “help” me vacuum. Since this one looks almost identical to our vacuum, I figured it would be great for him. It makes noise. It looks like it does in the picture. But that’s as far as it goes, really. The “brush head” wheels do not turn on our carpet, and only barely turn on the tile floor. I’m not upset that it doesn’t suck anything up, I’m upset that the brush head wheels only move if you spin them with your fingers. He still seems to dig the noise and play, but I’m not impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Jodie S.

customer_reviews.title: It has no real suction.
customer_reviews.text: The description says it has suction power, but it really doesn't. It is a great toy for my son who always wants to "help"me vacuum as it does keep him busy while I am cleaning. He hasn't noticed that he is not sucking anything up yet.
customer_reviews.author: Meagan Lynch

customer_reviews.title: Suction not working
customer_reviews.text: Suction not working and arrived broken. Is this supposed to be like this?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t really suck, but Such a darling replica!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because it’s a replica of the one I use the most and, well, let’s be honest: because “actual suction”. Yes please! I’m not happy at all with the complete absence of actual suction but I’m still giving it 5 stars because it’s a toy. For my 15-month old. I didn’t purchase it (or shouldn’t have) for its ability to vacuum. Lol. It’s darling and my son loves it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jen Rasmussen

customer_reviews.title: It sucks, but not in a good way like a vacuum should
customer_reviews.text: i bought this for my little boy because it is just like his daddy’s real Dyson (which he is obsessed with). The product description mentions “real suction” and that it can pick up little bits. That is FALSE. It can’t pick up even the tiniest littlest bit, which frustrates my kid who is trying to “vacuum.” Also, the debris trap latch seems like it’s a second away from being irreparably broken. I would not buy again and would actively discourage others because it was about $30 for a cheaply made, poorly functioning piece of junk.
customer_reviews.author: Steph Martin

customer_reviews.title: My toddler adores this
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son. He loves it and plays with it daily. I love that it looks just like our vacuum. The suction doesn't really do anything, but who cares, that's not why I bought it. It makes noise, has various nozzles, and keeps my son entertained as he "vacuums" while I clean. What a great toy.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: My daughters love it! It does pick up small light items the dirt will go into the whole not where the play dirt is. That’s the only weird part.
customer_reviews.author: Kelley wright

customer_reviews.title: Perfect replica
customer_reviews.text: This toy is sooo cute!!!!it’s very light my 15 month old carries it around and loves it!!!! His hand is to little to push the button to make the suction noise and the confetti inside the canister to go around but will be prefect when he gets bigger but he loves it regardless. It’s a perfect replica it looks identical to my real dyson which my son was obsessed with which is why I ordered it because I could never vacuum with him around and now I can because he uses his own!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good toy, could be easier
customer_reviews.text: I love that our little one can “help” clean, she’s only 18mos tho so can’t quite use it properly. I do wish it had just a regular On/off switch since she isn’t old enough to know that she has to keep holding the trigger down for it to run. Overall a cute and worthy toy that stops her from stealing my dyson while I’m cleaning XD I’m sure she’ll love it even more when she’s older
customer_reviews.author: nataliee

customer_reviews.title: Awesome little toy replica, my son loves it
customer_reviews.text: My son just turned a year and has been showing interest in our wireless Shark vacuum, so I started to look up replica toys and found this one of a dyson wireless (as close to our vacuum as we could). We got it and his eyes lit up and has now been playing majority of the time with it and mimicking my wife and I when we vacuum the kitchen. It light/well constructed/love the Rev trigger to make it act like it's vacuuming. The only complaint and why it's a 4star instead of a 5 is that it does not suck in any air like I've heard other do, so other than that an awesome item and buy
customer_reviews.author: Thickbass21

customer_reviews.title: 4 stars, my 4yr old loves it.
customer_reviews.text: My 4yr old son loves this toy vacuum. Ye has many toy vacuums and a few real ones too. But he had been wanting a cordless dyson, and since the real thing is just too expensive right now, we got him this lol. He uses it pretty much every day (still,) and it has held up well, especially for how often he likes to take it apart and click the pieces back in together. Its only got a couple minor scratches in the plastic, for as much use as its gotten lol. The suction isnt that good, but its a toy, so that should be expected. I give it 4 stars because my son loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Desiree Porto

customer_reviews.title: Great little toy to teach kids REAL life responsibilities
customer_reviews.text: Love that my daughter vacuums with me while I use my dyson and she uses this. The only thing that has broke since she got it from Santa is the plastic cover for the canister. It’s the same plastic cover that’s on the real Dyson so with any drops of it, of course it’s going to break, it’s plastic. No fault of the toy, just children not being careful & breaking toys unintentionally. It still works so it’s not an issue.
customer_reviews.author: M.C.

customer_reviews.title: No customer service and broke easily
customer_reviews.text: Expensive and broke within minutes of being played with. I tried to return it but don’t have a box big enough to fit the pieces. I reached out to the company in hopes I could be sent a box, but I got no response. I wish I would have just bought a cheaper brand.
customer_reviews.author: KristenMD

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loves it!
customer_reviews.text: I have the real Dyson and my one year old is always wanting to "help me" vacuum. I stumbled across this and just made her day when it arrived! The suction power does not pick up anything. The little plastic piece at the bottom of the canister broke off within a couple days. However, my daughter still plays with this everyday. She gets this out and "vacuums" right alongside me when I do.
customer_reviews.author: Momof3

customer_reviews.title: Such a Cute Toy Vacuum!
customer_reviews.text: I have the real version of this vacuum, which my son is obsessed with, so we got this toy version as a gift and he absolutely loves it. He vacuums almost everyday with me. It does pick up some lint but not much. I did not expect it to actually pick a lot up considering it’s just a toy. We have had this for about 4 months now and it has held up well with being used almost everyday and being dropped several times. Overall, I highly recommend this toy Dyson vacuum!
customer_reviews.author: Lyndsee Burtle

customer_reviews.title: Toddler loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Has pretty much no suction power but that’s fine with me, it makes the noise so it’s convincing to a toddler that it’s working. The flap that opens to dump out the dirt did snap off fairly quickly, but doesn’t affect the play. And my toddler loves to help me vacuum so this has been awesome bc we have the grown up version of this :)
customer_reviews.author: Brian & Abby

customer_reviews.title: Great toy for little helpers
customer_reviews.text: This is the cutest little toy, probably one of the best toys we have gotten for our son. It looks just like the real thing (or other brands of this style of vacuum.) Our son has to "help" every time we vacuum. It is holding up well overall. The little flap to "empty" the dust canister fell off due to rough play, but the rest works beautifully. He loves taking it apart and putting it back together. If your little one loves to "help" clean, this is a wonderful gift/toy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buy based on the type of vaccum your family uses
customer_reviews.text: I'm giving this a lower eating only because my son doesn't want to play with it. I wish we had gotten the upright vacc instead. That's what we use for our floors so I think he would have taken to it better. He also doesn't like having to squeeze the trigger, it's a little harder to squeeze with his little hands vs mine. The suction will suck up small particles when placed directly under the hole in the bottom of the vaccine cleaner. Even better suction when you use the hand held attachment which I myself loved playing with!
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlin Robertson

customer_reviews.title: My boys LOVE it!! Buy it already.
customer_reviews.text: Not really sure why everyone cares if it’s got solid suction? It’s not meant for heavy duty cleaning it’s a child’s toy. And it’s adorable. It’s just like moms and my two boys, ages 4 and 18 months LOVE it. They got it from Santa for Christmas and they use it literally everyday. Not only can you attach two different heads to the hose, but you can remove the hose and attach the two heads directly to the handle/base just like I can with my cordless dyson. My 4 year old likes to attach the motor head to the handheld portion and vacuum the stairs. The little beads twirl around and they love it. I would purchase again!!
customer_reviews.author: Tstan

customer_reviews.title: Not durable and too dangerous.
customer_reviews.text: Was great for a few weeks, doesn't really have any suction but was a fun little toy for my toddler. Then things started breaking. First the hinged door that's supposed to empty the dust canister broke off and left little plastic pieces broken off or jagged edges on the toy, then the tube connecting the handle and the bottom piece snapped in half leaving jagged dangerous edges. If a one year old can manage to break this thing that quickly it's certainly not durable enough to be a safe children's toy.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: It actually sucks... A little.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome toy for a little helper! My 2 yr old kept trying to use our Dyson stick vacc, but it is too heavy. This is a great replica for his size and helps him learn to help out. It even has a little bit of real suction (just enough for a little dust).
customer_reviews.author: Kev

customer_reviews.title: Granddaughter loved it!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 3 1/2 yr old granddaughter for Christmas. She was "vacuuming" our house for a couple of hours while visiting including the tops of beds and walls (Note: this doesn't have any suction). Her mom said she vacuumed at home for the next few days after Christmas, under beds and the front porch ! Even her 6 year old brother wanted to play with it, so much so that several "time outs" had to be implemented. By far, a most favorite toy enjoyed by all.
customer_reviews.author: Joan C

customer_reviews.title: Poor product!
customer_reviews.text: Unlike what is shown from product review, the toys has no power to clean up even a small rice! I really want to know if this is normal.
customer_reviews.author: Billy Fung

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy for toddler would be my recommendation
customer_reviews.text: We have a two-year-old and a five-year-old. They destroyed it. Was a waste of money very poorly made for children. Too many parts and pieces compartment where you empty out debri broke within a day. Absolutely adorable vacuum. But was a waste of money for children. And just a personal note my grandchildren are not destructive.
customer_reviews.author: Raven Beach

customer_reviews.title: soooo cute
customer_reviews.text: my son LOVES to help me clean. Got this for him so he could feel official. he prefers to use his ball popper when he's vacuuming with me but the look and everything about it is great. it does NOT actually work but I didn't buy this for him to ACTUALLY vacuum with me lol I just wanted him to have his own. A lot of reviews are people upset it doesn't work but damn, yall must be teaching your kids early lol
customer_reviews.author: Regina B.

customer_reviews.title: Recommended for kids that love to be grownups
customer_reviews.text: My kids (2 and 4) love playing grownup when my husband or myself vacuum. It looks just like the handheld Dyson we have for the adults. It makes a fun vacuum sound, opens at the bottom to empty out the “dirt”, the tube and head can detach, and it has an additional head attachment. I am not sure if is actually supposed to have suction, but it does not. The only problem we have had is the part that opens up when emptying the “dirt” keeps coming off. However, that is because our two-year-old literally slams everything on the ground as hard as he can. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Kid's lost interest after about a week
customer_reviews.text: As with most toys, kids lost interest. I think if it could actually act as a small kids vacuum then it would be played/used more often. Since it just makes a noise and doesn't actually really do anything, it is now just sitting there in the corner. Overall the build is great. Looks just like a mini-Dyson. I wouldn't purchase it thinking your kid would love to play with this or vacuum alongside you when you are cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Ko

customer_reviews.title: Top heavy. Doesn’t really suck up dust. Looks just like a Dyson
customer_reviews.text: I like that this looks just like the Dyson Cordless stick vacuum. My 1 yr grandson is driving my nuts crying when I turn my cordless vacuum off! Yes that’s correct because he thinks our play time is over. I thought maybe if he had his own he would be happy. Not! First thing it was way too top heavy, two, the on button has to engaged to make noise. FYI that’s why I didn’t go with a Dyson but another brand too. Also, this has 000 suction!!!! Just noise.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It exceeded my hopes .
customer_reviews.text: My 20 month old granddaughter is terrified by my son in laws Dyson vacuum so I thought if I bought this for her and asked her to help her daddy vacuum maybe she would overcome her fear. Bingo it worked she was a little reluctant at first but now she has no fear and loves her vacuum. It wasn’t designed to take over for a real vacuum but I was surprised that there was a little suction when turned on.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Great for Helping Vacuum Fears
customer_reviews.text: My son loves his vacuum, we've had it for a year now and it's still going strong. This has also helped my son to be less afraid of our vacuum, which looks exactly like this, and he loves to help us vacuum now! I dinged it a star because the debris tray broke after the vacuum got dropped when it was opened. The vacuum doesn't really have any suction so the debris tray isn't necessary.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel & Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Great toy! But, doesn't really have the "suctin"
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my nephew for Christmas. He loves they toy and I will admit it is super cute. The second attachment is very nice. However, I wouldn't say that there is any suction. It will barely pick up cat/dog hair. Although that isn't the point of the product, I thought that would be an added bonus for my sister! Overall an okay product, just wish it worked as it promised.
customer_reviews.author: S. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Great toy for your kid helper!
customer_reviews.text: My kid (2 years old) loves to vacuum, and be a helper. He uses this everyday, he loves it and feels so independent. It’s also great that I don’t have to fight him for my vacuum anymore. He loves it when we empty the cup and he sees the real stuff the vacuum has picked up. It’s only very small lightweight things, but with the dog bringing in lots of little leaves, this this has actually come in handy.
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: Cute toy but there is zero suction
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if there is a different kids dyson that some people are reviewing but what be recieved has zero suction. It reminds me of the old school kiddie vacuum complete with the colored balls inside where dirt would go. The long floor attachment seems flimsy too so we will see how long that lasts. But this has made my son happy since he has his own that looks just like mommy's
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: arrived broken but still fun
customer_reviews.text: I’m really torn, here! My son is 18 months old & he loves this vacuum. BUT there is one part that was broken when we unboxed it.... where the tube attaches to the vacuum (see pics). The suction is a moot point. If you’re buying this just for the suction, don’t get your hopes up. All in all... we love this vacuum... even though we had to duct tape it together. I gave it 3 stars because it was broken when we received it.
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Well Made But Suction Has Never Worked
customer_reviews.text: My son is obsessed with our dyson and he loves his little toy one. I’m giving it three stars instead of five because the suction has never worked. This is a huge disappointment because he wants to actually clean stuff. I wasn’t expecting it to work really well but it has never worked at all. I will say that it is durable. He’s had it for months and it’s his fave toy and it’s still in one piece.
customer_reviews.author: M.E.Evans

customer_reviews.title: Mini dyson for toddler
customer_reviews.text: Pros: what a great toy for the little one. Distraction, I give it to my 18month old while I vacuum and he doesn’t beg me to have mine! Easy to put together Durable, Doesn’t break after many crashes to the floor. Cons: Batteries go out fast. But he still enjoys it once they are dead. Suction, The vacuum does suction some but not so much that it picks up things.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Ann Austin

customer_reviews.title: Big hit.
customer_reviews.text: My son loves it. I got it so he would stop trying to take mine from me when I'm cleaning the house. Now we walk around and vacuum together. Has a super light suction that can pick up leaves and light dirt. I wouldn't say its useful though. Just a toy. Pretty durable. It has handled my son slamming and swinging it around. Has some fun attachments like a real vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks and sounds like the real thing
customer_reviews.text: This little vacuum is perfect for a two or three year old. My grandson absolutely loves it and he hasn't stopped playing with it for days now. It pushes easily on carpet & floors. It looks & sounds like the adult version. No on & off button to worry about- Push & hold the button for power. As others have mentioned, the plastic door cover won't stay attached to the cylinder tub but this doesn't have any effect on the functionality of the toy- I just removed it all together- It does not have suction power. It is a toy.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Wood

customer_reviews.title: Happy for the purchase
customer_reviews.text: Got a dayon v7 and was looking here for a pretend vacuum for my 16 month old since she’s always watching me vacuum her room. I’m so glad I found this and it is exactly what my vacuum looks like! Well, except for the orange tube but it’s amazing how this company copies the real vacuum and also included an attachment for it. So glad I came across this one!
customer_reviews.author: Xutzen

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts
customer_reviews.text: Update: just called customer service and they’re sending another out that will be here tomorrow for his birthday. I’ll update functionality afterwards. I just opened this to put batteries in it before I wrapped it for for my son’s birthday tomorrow. It’s missing an attachment! My son absolutely loves our vacuum and is always stealing it to use. I know he’s going to love this but now I have to return it. Not happy and now I have no other gift.
customer_reviews.author: Bressavage

customer_reviews.title: Super Cute!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is 16m and she always tries to steal the vacuum from us while we're using it so we got here this mini look alike, now she pretends to vacuum with hers when we clean the floors and it's the cutest ever! She's pretty young and can't hold the trigger down and it is a little big still for her but she loves to play with it and it's the cutest!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Great play toy. For little clean up people.
customer_reviews.text: My grandson wanted to play with my daughters Dyson all the time. Bought this for Christmas to hopefully divert his attention. Seems to have worked. Nice toy for the child who wants to clean. Fun to watch them play. It even has a flap to open to pretend to dump the trash. This doesn’t actually pick up trash, which is a good thing.
customer_reviews.author: RP

customer_reviews.title: Perfect children’s toy for an appliance obsessed child!!
customer_reviews.text: I gave this play Dyson to my grandson for Christmas. He is obsessed with appliances and especially cleaning appliances. He opened the gift bag and and screamed “it’s a Dyson!”. He made his father install the batteries and proceeded to vacuum. It’s amazing how this is a perfect replica of the real thing. It does pick up small particles and works well. It’s the perfect gift.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No real suction
customer_reviews.text: No real suction, but kids like it thats the only reason it got 1 star. False advertisement in regards to the real suction.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Extrememly disappointed with this product. I watched the videos and was super excited to give this as a gift to my little girl so she could feel like a big helper, however this vacuume does not have any real suction power, it does not pick up anything, it does have fake beads that rotate inside the container of vacuume. Again if your child is old enough to know if it works or doesnt then dont buy, but if it is just for looks and fun rhen it is a decent buy.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Potter

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Replica
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic replica toy for that little helper. It doesn’t pick up but the beadlet things inside make it look that way. The three year old I purchased this for follows me around while I’m using the “big sized” sweeper and he uses the “little sized” one. It’s great exercise and teaches that cleaning is a part of life!
customer_reviews.author: F. Earthwalker

customer_reviews.title: Does not have real suction but is still neat!
customer_reviews.text: Thought I read that it actually vacuumed, however it does not seem to suck anything. The whirling bits stay in there and make it appear as though it’s sucking things. That said, my 3 year old is in heaven. Looks just like mine and sounds real. She can even pretend to dump out the debris. Not quite as durable as I had hoped as it’s all plastic and feels a little like she will break it. Good product for the price I think.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Morris

customer_reviews.title: Looks like the real thing
customer_reviews.text: This is really cute, looks just like the real thing. It’s wrapped for Xmas, so can’t comment on suction or durability. I wouldn’t think the suction would be very strong since it’s a toy & not designed to actually clean. Appears durable enough, I’d rather it break from being loved too much than discarded and intact.
customer_reviews.author: L. A. Metz

customer_reviews.title: Fun and Cute Toy
customer_reviews.text: Gift for my grandson that is a 1 year old. He loves it. He was fascinated with my vacuum and was excited over this look alike. It does make the noise of a vacuum but does not have suction enough to actually vacuum. There are little pieces of confetti in the garbage collection area that bounce around.
customer_reviews.author: rjsmilebug

customer_reviews.title: Best money spent
customer_reviews.text: This was probably the best $35 spent. My 18 month old son loves it has played with it for literally 8 hours. I wasn’t expecting it to suck up much cause I read the other reviews and it doesn’t suck up anything, which I don’t care about. The only reason for the 4 stars is that the little door doesn’t stay latched and I’ve had to tape it twice in the last 24 hours. Otherwise if you wanna make your baby happy this is the best item I’ve bought
customer_reviews.author: Kristy Petersen

customer_reviews.title: Received defective product and damaged box.
customer_reviews.text: Sadly, I received a defective product and the box was also damaged. When I opened the battery compartment, the battery slot set up were wrong (see pic) this making the vaccum unusable as described. Toddler was super disappointed. Had to return.
customer_reviews.author: Lovely

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy!
customer_reviews.text: So disappointed... stoped working, the middle orange part was warped and never really clipped in right where it was supposed to. Spend 50$ and it doesn’t work..
customer_reviews.author: Molly

customer_reviews.title: My son loves it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 4 year old and he loves it. It really picks up debris off of the ground and can be emptied like our real vaccum. Being able to take it apart to use as a handheld is an awesome touch. If your little one likes to help clean up around the house, I'd definitely recommend buying this.
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: It's okay
customer_reviews.text: My son loves to help clean up, so why not feed that interest. I purchased this vacuum and he absolutely loved it. He vacuumed for about 3 hours and feel asleep with it in his hand. The following morning he awoke only to ask for the vacuum. Unfortunately half way through that day not even 24 hours after he received the gift the orange tube broke. The vacuum still works as a smaller hand held vacuum yes. But it did break. I'm disappointed to say the least. This was the first toy he actually played with voluntarily and it broke within 24 hours.
customer_reviews.author: Raelyn Hoovler

customer_reviews.title: Great Toy
customer_reviews.text: My son loves that he now has the miniature version of our full-size dyson. People who thought this toy would actually have suction are delusional. It makes a quite vacuum noise when the trigger is depressed and spins around little beads in the debris chamber. Ultimate vacuum toy for a toddler that wants to be just like their parents.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Hoping she continues cleaning as she grows!
customer_reviews.text: My kid LOVES this and vacuums when we vacuum instead of fighting for control over the real vacuum which looks nearly identical. I like that it has the accessory as well. I don't know why I'm being asked to rate is suction. Really no need for it to have real suction. I certainly don't want to clean dirt out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Lianara

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: It's very crappy quality. Ofcourse close to zero suction but that is expected. I had a V8 when I got this one for my son. Now I have V11 torque drive and I love it. V11 is so much better then V8, so maybe they made the toy one better as well. If buying first time would definitely consider looking into different one.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra Quartieri

customer_reviews.title: How cute! Big hit.
customer_reviews.text: Christmas gifts for my 5 yr old niece and my own 4yr old son. Great for pretend. Perfect size and looks so real. It does do some suction but it truly is more for play. My son does model me while I’m vacuuming, but if there is a real mess he wants to use the actual vacuum. Overall still a win for me.
customer_reviews.author: paula elaine givens

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work- falsely advertised
customer_reviews.text: It’s cute and all but it clearly advertises itself as a working vacuum with suction. While I understand it’s a child’s toy, it should not be falsely advertised as working. Nearly -$40 is a little steep for me to pay for something that’s not as what it was advertised to be.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon_shopper

customer_reviews.title: Toddler nephew loves it
customer_reviews.text: I have the real deal and my nephew fell in love with it! I got this for him when he was ~18 months old and 4 months later he still enjoys playing with it. He likes the two heads (and that one of them has a fun yellow tube to wave around!) and the pretty realistic (but quieter) sound it makes.
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte

customer_reviews.title: Looks almost identical to the real one
customer_reviews.text: This actually has a decent amount of suction for the fact that it is a toy! But don’t expect it to actually clean 😆 My daughter LOVES vacumning with me! She loves that it’s JUST like mamas! If the pipe on it wasn’t orange, it would look like an exact replica of the real thing!
customer_reviews.author: Adepino

customer_reviews.title: Died within the first 48 hours
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my 2 year old grandson who loves to help mommy clean. This was his favorite gift and he vacuumed the whole house several times. Unfortunately it broke (stopped working) within the first 2 days of using it. Up until then it was his favorite gift. BTW, he was not rough with it as little boys can be, he only used it to vacuum until it died :-(
customer_reviews.author: Sonja Ferrara

customer_reviews.title: Ugh... now I want a cordless vaccum
customer_reviews.text: Got this toy Dyson up right for my 2 year old. He loves it. He is afraid of vacuums so I wanted to get him something to help. He loves it and will vaccum with me now. He is tall and this still has room to grow. The suction power dosen't suck up anything but honestly I dont want my kid sucking up stuff. Only thing I can even complain about is I wish it had a wall mount... I'm very happy with his toy and so is he. I want a Dyson now!
customer_reviews.author: amanda

customer_reviews.title: Fun Toy for Toddler
customer_reviews.text: We have an actual Dyson Vacuum and my son at the time (12 month), was always mimicking the vacuuming process by following me around. I got him this toy when he was 14 month and he loves it! He would grab it every time as I start to vacuum and follows me everywhere. It makes exact same noise and easy to use. Great toy for boys and I am sure for girls too :)
customer_reviews.author: EKaterina Pogibelnaya

customer_reviews.title: Two stars because the kid was loved it.
customer_reviews.text: The whole family was excited for this gift since we all have the larger cordless Dyson vacuums. I tried to put the batteries in and it hit the floor. The bottom portion that holds dirt popped off and shattered. It had to have been no more than a foot and a half off the ground for it to break.
customer_reviews.author: Booplesnoot

customer_reviews.title: Very low expectations & disappointed still
customer_reviews.text: I thought it would actually have some suction. It has zero! My expectations were fairly low in the first place, but I did expect it to pick up tiny cracker crumbs at minimum. This product does not actually function as described. Also, this product was to include at least one attachment. No attachments were included what so ever. Not at all what I expected even with having low expectations in the first place.
customer_reviews.author: samantha

customer_reviews.title: Great toy but unsure of longevity
customer_reviews.text: I’m torn on this one. We got one that didn’t work longer than a day and amazon replaced it. The second one is going strong. Maybe a fluke? Kid loves it though. Always runs off to grab so he can help out it when mom gets the real out and starts vacuuming. Makes for a heartwarming scene
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Fun purchase and looks real
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this and it truly does look likey real Dyson! I don't like that it does NOT prop up easily at all (which my real Dyson does) and the vacuum head easily twists around which frustrates my child. Otherwise it's a fun purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney R.

customer_reviews.title: just like dyson with a very low humming sound
customer_reviews.text: it looks like my real dyson so my toddler pretend play while I am cleaning.. no suction and the sound is pretty mild which I think is better. No songs or lights. It is simple and nice. I dont think I needed one more toy with loud music and lights so I like it
customer_reviews.author: berkin

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for little helpers!
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome toy for a toddler that likes to help with the chores. Not sure why Amazon wants me to rate the suction of this product when it's a toy. It does however have a little suction and can suck up dirty and other light objects. Really cool toy!
customer_reviews.author: Norge

customer_reviews.title: Cute!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 1yr old and even tho he is too young for it, I know he’ll love it soon. He likes to hold my hand when I vacuum and soon he’ll reach for the vacuum and he’ll have his own to use. It’s good quality and seems durable. It’s so cute!
customer_reviews.author: WijNab

customer_reviews.title: Adorable!
customer_reviews.text: Super cute. My son is crazy about it. I would like, however, for it to have been a bit more durable - he dropped it almost immediately and the bottom door for the dirt chamber broke clean off. Otherwise I’ve been really happy with this toy.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Cutest thing ever
customer_reviews.text: This is the cutest concept ever. I love this vacuum and my son loves it because it looks exactly like mine! I had a little hope for the suction power even though I read prior reviews and they were correct there is no suction but it is a really cute gift either way.
customer_reviews.author: Madison

customer_reviews.title: Accurate to the real vacuum
customer_reviews.text: All my son wanted for Christmas was this specific vacuum. It doesn’t really have suction power, but the sound and appearance is accurate to a real vacuum. They sometimes turn it into a sword and it hasn’t broke yet.
customer_reviews.author: Sharareh

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for toddler that imitates mommy
customer_reviews.text: Love this little toy vacuum for my toddler! Looks just like my real one and she can follow me around when I vacuum. It runs on batteries and makes a little whirring sound and beads swirl around in the basket, looking like dust that got sucked up.
customer_reviews.author: Leandra

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but REALLY wish it had suction
customer_reviews.text: Cute when my toddlers want to "help" clean. This is 100% a toy with no suction power. Dyson.... want to know how to make moms of messy children happy? Give this actual suction. Accessories are cute. My kitty's still like it, but they toss it when I put mine down so they can actually see the "dirt" go into the vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: jamiepopo

customer_reviews.title: Wish it actually sucked
customer_reviews.text: These are great, the kids love them, but my one gripe: make them work! Why can’t kids vacuums actually sucks things up? Just make it work. Doesn’t have to work well, just make help the kids be a little helpful when they are trying to be helpful. That’s all I ask.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for your little helper!
customer_reviews.text: My husband got me and my son matching vacuums since we both love to clean so much... and this thing is the cutest thing EVER. It looks just like my Dyson, makes noise when you press the button, and actually sucks a little bit of dirt up. My son LOVES it. If your little one loves to clean with you, definitely buy this for them!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Loves his vacuum.
customer_reviews.text: Though this doesn’t have any suction power my toddler loves this toy. We vacuum together so he feels like he is doing something. One thing is he doesn’t like is when the motor Is attached so I detach it and he hold onto the handle no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Shananigans

customer_reviews.title: Grandson loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loves my real Dyson so this toy one was a perfect match for his b'day. He loves it and that is what counts. It isn't important that it doesn't have the suction of the real thing. It's a toy after all. It does have suction to pick up small paper and other small pieces. so far durable and easy for him to maneuver
customer_reviews.author: Anne E. Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Got this because my son loves when I vacuum (and I have the exact one (obviously full size) it’s definitely not made for children who drop things often... (so basically most kids) it’s banged up but he still uses it to be like his momma
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: My kids love this toy
customer_reviews.text: This is a good toy and my kids have been using it for months, especially when they see someone vacuuming. The bottom plastic lid is sort of weak at the attachment and so it broke off, but otherwise it's good.
customer_reviews.author: SSA

customer_reviews.title: Amazon warehouse order
customer_reviews.text: Ordered from amazon warehouse. Came already with batteries, missing an accessory, and the main suction/vacuum part missing the portion that creates the vacuum. Replacement pending. Will see if the new one is any better.
customer_reviews.author: chrissamoz

customer_reviews.title: No suction but great toy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my toddler who loves to help vacuum. And he is 1 1/2 and loves it! It battery powered by AA but it does not have any suction what so ever! So if your buying this as a toy it’s great! But don’t expect it to clean anything
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Simons

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as pictured.
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my 1 year old granddaughter wanted her vacuum match my Dyson. She loves it. It looks very similar. (Except color of the pole.) Even has attachment. Though like the adult version there is no place to put attachment while using. So it's already lost. But the vacuum has been dropped and still works.
customer_reviews.author: C. Craft

customer_reviews.title: The cutest thing - my 1,5 yo son loves it so much
customer_reviews.text: It's his favorite toy so far, and now we can vacuum clean our house without him crying to get the Dyson, he vacuums with his own. It doesn't really have suction power, but that wasn't the purpose anyway. The tray lid broke pretty quickly, which was disappointing, and the tube is made out of plastic and not aluminium like the original but aside from that we love it
customer_reviews.author: AF

customer_reviews.title: Don't expect it to actually suck anything up.
customer_reviews.text: Definitely cute.. keeps my 3 year old busy "helping" while I'm trying to vacuum. He loves the thing. Just don't expect this thing to vaccume up anything. Literally zero suction. Zero. Other than that it is what it is. My kid loves it
customer_reviews.author: DJM

customer_reviews.title: Motor no longer turns on to even make sound.
customer_reviews.text: When my son first received this for Christmas it was a big hit. He plays with it almost daily. However after just over a month it quit working. Changed the batteries “no big deal” I said. Then the next day nothing again. Maybe it was bad batteries. No it just all together quit and just outside the return window naturally. My son loves this toy cause he loves to help clean. He now brings it to me asking me to turn it on and I can’t.
customer_reviews.author: Gavin

customer_reviews.title: Great toy, but my son broke it right away
customer_reviews.text: My son loves our Dyson vacuum so we bought this replica toy for him... it looks exactly like the real dyson, has suction as I would expect from a toy and sounds like the real thing. The only issue I have is that he drops it often from a distance of 8-12 inches. The first time he dropped it the battery door broke and I have to tape it shut.
customer_reviews.author: Football1209

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Toy!
customer_reviews.text: We love this toy! Our two year old loves to “clean” and was constantly trying to take our Dyson and we were afraid he would brake it. So we got him his own! It doesn’t have much suction power, so don’t expect to let your kid clean the house and not have to do anything yourself. Also, the “door” to empty the contents broke off almost immediately, so ours doesn’t actually hold anything in anymore. Still a super cute toy that our son runs and grabs any time we’re vacuuming so he can get in on the action.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for helping toddlers!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter just turned 2 and loves helping her dad clean. This is perfect for her! The size is great, but shes big for her age so I think it would work for 2-5 year olds, and she can easily get the button to make the sounds. Suction leaves something to be desired but that's okay. Would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: SHSTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Our kid loves it!
customer_reviews.text: We got this as one of our toddlers Christmas presents and he loves interchanging the different parts and dumping the collection bin after vacuuming beside mommy with the full size matching dyson. Definitely one of his most used toys!
customer_reviews.author: BBfamily

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and cheesy
customer_reviews.text: Gave this to my grandson who is obsessed with my stick vacuum thinking since it claimed to have suction and be like a “real vacuum “ he would like it. Not true. Item just seems very cheesy and cheap. He played with it for about two minutes and threw it down and could care less about it. $30 for a toy is a lot for me to pay Don’t waste your money on this!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute replica with sounds but without suction
customer_reviews.text: This is a cute replica of the Dyson cordless vacuum. My three-year-old loves to pretend with this toy while we are vacuuming. The suction is minimal but the rotating small toy particles inside the canister make it seem as if you’re picking up debris.
customer_reviews.author: C. Coble

customer_reviews.title: Not what it seems... doesn’t auction at all!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for Christmas for our little girl since we have a handheld stain. Doesn’t suction at all! A bit of waste of money to be honest... supposedly it suctions but it does not! It’s cute and that’s about it.
customer_reviews.author: KKB3338

customer_reviews.title: Good toy vacuum
customer_reviews.text: It’s a good toy and hence I am not bothered about the suction. We have actual Dyson vacuum at home and when ever we use that, my son also joins the fun with this vacuum. He likes it overall and the one problem is that it grabs little bit of dust into its bin but I don’t see a way to empty it. Dust goes inside where we can’t get rid of easily.
customer_reviews.author: Vin

customer_reviews.title: So cute! Just like the real thing!
customer_reviews.text: This looks just like our Dyson and my son loves having a matching stickvac to “vacuum” with us. We did have the issue others have stated where the canister lid broke off. It’s fine because we aren’t really sucking up dirt anyhow so we just threw it out. But if that would bother you, just know it’s likely to happen!
customer_reviews.author: ccc1184

customer_reviews.title: Teuer
customer_reviews.text: It's a plastic toy for toddlers.... I don't think it's going to hold up for the price, but we're a month away from Christmas and it hasn't cracked or broken yet, so that's something. Eats batteries kind of quick for only offering a little noise of the vacuum
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Great toy.
customer_reviews.text: She loves it! I love that it looks just like my V8 dyson. She vacuums with me and it seems the job goes quickly because I am watching her smile. Kerp in mind this is a toy, not a real vacuum
customer_reviews.author: Kim Johnson

product_meta.title: CASDON Little Helper Dyson Cord-Free Vacuum Cleaner Toy, Grey, Orange and Purple
product_meta.description: A toy replica of the famous Dyson Cord Free Vacuum for realistic pretend play! It has working suction, simulated cyclone action and authentic sound. The attachments have an easy release removal system - for short nozzle or long handled 'twist & turn' cleaning. Just like the real thing, but perfect for Little Helper’s hands!
feature_bullets: Realistic role play for exploring imagination and developing social skills
Replica design with iconic colors for visual realism
Play encourages the development of hand-to-eye co-ordination
Working suction and cyclone action for understanding cause and effect
Different attachments and ways to play, help to develop problem solving and motor skills
Independent play encourages exploration and discovery

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars3,229 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
